title: How the Navy will save $6 million a year on energy at one air station
text:
31 How the Navy will save $6 million a year on energy at one air station 
Greenbiz: Breakthrough energy savings performance contract projects exemplify a way to unlock deep levels of energy savings. These so-called ESPC projects are financed through energy and water cost savings, allowing clients to reduce their overall energy and water consumption and save money with no upfront capital costs.
